view.status:
You're in the center of a vast cavern, in the place you call home.

NOTE: You have NSFW content enabled. If you are playing in an environment where that is a problem, leave off the '?nsfw=true' part of the URL.

up.preview: It looks like pretty open space up there, near the large, arching roof of the cavern. Plenty of space to fly.

north.preview: Your mother's ribs arch down through the area over there, massive columns visible from a distance.

east.preview: A river is running through the cavern over there. A good place to go fishing or take a drink, or even a bath.

west.preview: It looks like an unremarkable area in the middle of the cavern. You don't really see much of anything for some distance.

south.preview: A river is running through the cavern over there. A good place to go fishing or take a drink, or even a bath.

controls.help: Fast forward time to recover from your trevails. In addition, you may have a resting event, and also save a checkpoint in case you die or want to rewind.

lines.help:
Health.
When your health drops to zero, you will be force to rewind to your last rest point. Over time, nutrition converts to stamina and then to health.

Stamina.
When your stamina drops to zero, you will need to digest food to recover. Some actions spend stamina, and also it converts to health over time.

Nutrition.
Eat food to fill up so you can recover and heal.
